I.name: Blast Shield
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Vi''' gains a {{tip|shield}} equal to {{sti|{{as|13% of her '''maximum''' health}}}} for 3 seconds whenever she hits an enemy with an [[champion ability|ability]].
''Blast Shield's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by 3 seconds for every trigger of ''{{ai|Denting Blows|Vi}}''.
I.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Vi gains a shield equal to 13% of her maximum health for 3 seconds whenever she hits an enemy with an champion ability.
Blast Shield's cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds for every trigger of Vi's Denting Blows.
I.notes: * Triggering {{ai|Denting Blows|Vi}} will not activate ''Blast Shield''.

Q.name: Vault Breaker
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Vi''' {{tip|channel|charges}} while being {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 15% for up to 4 seconds to increase ''Vault Breaker's'' {{sti|range}}, speed, and damage over the first {{fd|1.25}} seconds of the channel. ''Vault Breaker'' can be recast at any time within its duration.
If the charge completes without reactivation, ''Vault Breaker'' is canceled and goes on full cooldown.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Vi''' {{tip|dashes}} in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies within her path, increased by {{pp|type=channel time|key=%|0 to 100 for 11|0 to 1.25|round1=3|formula=10% per 0.125 seconds. ''This is capped at 1.25 seconds.''}}.

'''Vi''' stops upon colliding with an enemy champion, {{tip|airborne|knocking them back}} in the direction she is facing over {{fd|0.75}} seconds, while non-champion enemies hit along her path are instead {{tip|airborne|pulled}} towards her.
''Vault Breaker'' will go on a 3-second {{sti|cooldown}} if the charged channel is canceled.
Q.descriptionHtml:
Active: Vi charges while being slowed by 15% for up to 4 seconds to increase Vault Breaker's range, speed, and damage over the first 1.25 seconds of the channel. Vault Breaker can be recast at any time within its duration.
If the charge completes without reactivation, Vault Breaker is canceled and goes on full cooldown.
Recast: Vi dashes in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies within her path, increased by 0 to 1.25 ‒ undefined.
Vi stops upon colliding with an enemy champion, knocking them back in the direction she is facing over 0.75 seconds, while non-champion enemies hit along her path are instead pulled towards her.
Vault Breaker will go on a 3-second cooldown if the charged channel is canceled.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{ap|55 to 155}} {{as|(+ 70% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|55*2 to 155*2}} {{as|(+ 140% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}

effects.str:
• Minimum Physical Damage: (+ 70% bonus AD)
  • Maximum Damage: (+ 140% bonus AD)

W.name: Denting Blows
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Vi's''' [[basic attack]]s {{tip|on-hit}} and ''{{ai|Vault Breaker|Vi}}'' apply a [[stack]] of ''Denting Blows'' to affected enemies for 4 seconds, [[stack]]ing up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent applications. The third stack consumes them all to deal {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and {{sti|armor penetration|{{as|reduce the target's armor by 20%}}}}, with the '''bonus''' damage capped at 300 against non-champions.
After triggering ''Denting Blows'', '''Vi''' gains {{sti|as|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent triggers.
W.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Vi's basic attacks on-hit and Vi's Vault Breaker apply a stack of Denting Blows to affected enemies for 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent applications. The third stack consumes them all to deal bonus physical damage and reduce the target's armor by 20%, with the bonus damage capped at 300 against non-champions.
After triggering Denting Blows, Vi gains bonus attack speed for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent triggers.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{as|{{ap|4 to 10}}% {{as|(+{{ft|1% per 35|{{fd|2.86}}% per 100}}'''bonus''' AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}}}
W.notes:
* The armor penetration will apply after the triggering damage.
* The enhanced attack applies other {{tip|on-hit}} effects and can both {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal as well as apply {{sti|life steal|link=true}} (the bonus damage cannot do either).
* ''Denting Blows'' can be {{tip|blocked}} but cannot be {{tip|dodged}} nor missed while '''Vi''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
* The attacks do not affect [[structures]] nor [[ward]]s.

effects.str: • Bonus Physical Damage: % (+bonus AD) of target's maximum health

st_slices: % (+bonus AD) of target's maximum health

E.name: Relentless Force
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Vi''' periodically stores up to 2 ''Relentless Force'' charges.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Vi's''' next [[basic attack]] within 6 seconds has an {{tip|uncancellable windup}}, gains {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}} and deals modified {{as|physical damage}}, as well as deals the same damage to all enemies in a cone in the direction of the target. ''Relentless Force'' can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|75|100}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
''Relentless Force'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Vi's''' basic attack timer.
E.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Vi periodically stores up to 2 Relentless Force charges.
Active: Vi's next basic attack within 6 seconds has an uncancellable windup, gains 50 bonus range and deals modified physical damage, as well as deals the same damage to all enemies in a cone in the direction of the target. Relentless Force can critically strike for (+ IE 25%) AD bonus physical damage.
Relentless Force resets Vi's basic attack timer.
E.notes:
* The empowered attack has the same windup time as '''Vi's''' basic attacks.
* ''Relentless Force'' deals {{tip|basic damage}} to the primary target and {{tip|area damage}} to secondary targets hit by the are of effect.
* {{ai|Denting Blows|Vi}} will only apply a stack on ''Relentless Force's'' primary target (does not interact with the cone's damage).
* If the ''Relentless Force'' buff is about to run out as '''Vi''' starts the attack windup, the duration will be updated and extended to allow '''Vi''' to still sucessfully attack.

effects.str: • Physical Damage: (+ 110% AD) (+ 90% AP)

R.name: Cease and Desist
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Vi''' singles out the target enemy {{tip|champion}}, {{tip|dash|dashing}} with {{tip|displacement immunity}} towards them, during which they are {{tip|true sight|revealed}}. Upon being within 300 units of them, she {{tip|dash|dashes}} through and grabs them, {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} for {{fd|1.3}} seconds and dealing them {{as|physical damage}} after {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
Enemies within her path are dealt the same damage, {{tip|airborne|knocked aside}} by 350 units over {{fd|0.25}} seconds, and simultaneously {{tip|stun|stunned}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
R.descriptionHtml:
Active: Vi singles out the target enemy champion, dashing with displacement immunity towards them, during which they are revealed. Upon being within 300 units of them, she dashes through and grabs them, knocking them up for 1.3 seconds and dealing them physical damage after 0.75 seconds.
Enemies within her path are dealt the same damage, knocked aside by 350 units over 0.25 seconds, and simultaneously stunned for 0.75 seconds.
R.notes:
* '''Vi''' will track the target if they change locations.
** She will stop dashing if the target is too far away or moves beyond {{tt|1500|Estimated}} units.
* '''Vi''' will land to the opposite side of the target after a delay of grabbing them.
* Secondary targets will be affected as soon as they come into contact with '''Vi''', and cannot be affected by this again for ~4 seconds.
* The {{tip|airborne}} debuff cannot be overridden.
* The dash will not end prematurely if '''Vi''' {{tip|blink|blinks}}.
* The {{tip|displacement immunity}} lasts until the ability fully ends.
** If the dash ends from entering resurrection or the target being too far away, the displacement immunity will remain for 7 seconds, and will otherwise be lost.{{bug}}
* The dash speed increases with time travelled.
{{Unit-targeted cancel conditions}}
* If the target becomes untargetable during the dash, '''Vi''' ends the dash prematurely and moves towards the target briefly, ignoring any movement commands. If '''Vi''' enters grabbing range, she will apply the {{tip|airborne}} effect but not dealing any damage.
* If '''Vi''' enters {{tip|resurrection}} during the cast time, she will still dash and apply the airborne effect to the target upon entering grabbing range though not dealing any damage.
* ''Cease and Desist'' will cancel and go on full cooldown if '''Vi''' is affected by {{ai|Fear Beyond Death 2|Urgot|Fear Beyond Death's}} recast during the cast time.
* {{tip|Displacement immunity}} will not resist the application of the {{tip|stun}}.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Vi''' is {{tip|dash|dashing}}:
** {{si|Flash}} cannot be used while '''Vi''' has grabbed the target.
{{ct|attack=false|move=false|cast={{ai|Relentless Force|Vi}} is usable. {{ai|Vault Breaker|Vi}} is disabled.|items=false|consume=false|spells=true,true,false,false,true|interrupts=death}}
